name: Croqueur
overview: Croqueur (French for Crunchy) is a French language arcade collect 'em up game for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Christian Planckaert and published in Hebdogiciel N°118 (17.01.1986) + N°119 (24.01.1986). The game has some resemblance to the early 1980s C64 game, Jawbreaker. Eat all the sweets, but avoid the baddies.
